about_the_game:
"Apocalypse Party X Cthulhu Adventure" — An Unprecedented Crossover Extravaganza!


The upcoming free DLC from "Apocalypse Party" and "20 Minutes Till Dawn" is set to bring an epic adventure like never before.

🌟 New Characters, New Weapons, New Talents — All for an Electrifying Combat Experience!






In this special DLC, Hina and Daixue, two popular characters from "20 Minutes Till Dawn," cross game boundaries to join the apocalyptic frenzy of "Apocalypse Party." Moreover, we've prepared three brand new weapons for you - the Bat Gun, Magic Feather, and the Blade of Synchronized Attack, along with three magical orange talents: Fury of Dawn, Curse Scythe, and Shadow Scythe.



👾 Character Skill Introduction:



Hina's Shadow Dance: Dash forward with incredible speed, leaving behind illusions to confound enemies, making your attacks omnipresent like a phantom.
Daixue's Elk Spirit: Transform into an elk after slaying a certain number of enemies, using its formidable impact force to withstand the onslaught of Cthulhu creatures.


🎉 Join us now for double the thrill and double the fun! This special DLC is completely free - don't miss out on this unique gaming feast!

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
